idea:
Mobile based platform that offers anonymous 
chat based access to certified mental 
health experts.
Certified mental health experts offer 
counselling and psychotherapy through the 
platform on revenue sharing model.
The platform generates data through 
interactions between users and experts.
Data are used to build a smarter platform that 
augments the experts by driving efficiency and 
precision in delivering mental health care.
Profits, and data generated are invested to 
reskill urban India women looking to re
-enter 
workforce post maternity break and offer them 
a career path as mental wellness coaches.
name: NEUROCEPTS WELLNESS VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Creating Advance Health Monitoring Digital Diagnostic kiosk which can generate instant accurate reports and can connect doctor with tele-medicine facility and supported by health analytics .  this kiosk can perform all types of preventive diagnostic test.  Supported by advance cloud and server solutions.  Same reports will be uploaded on app and can be accessed anytime
name: SANSKRITECH SMART SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea: Company's aim is to start a OOH on Giant Electronic Screens which will project the advertisements of local, private & government for their marketing & advertising fields.Company's aim is to start a OOH on Giant Electronic Screens which will project the advertisements of local, private & government for their marketing & advertising fields.

idea: EVEH Clean energy will be providing Electric Vehicle charging infrastructure at various places across Maharashtra, expanding to Pan India, moving further. The charging infrastructure will be backed by the renewable sources of energy which will create requirement of manpower. (On average 250 man hours are required per 100Kw of solar power plant.) EVEH Clean plans to deploy 5000Kw for its operation. For charging infrastructure, we have identified, suitable consortium where employment will be created based on orders placed by us, which shall be a multi-fold arrangement.
name: EVEH CLEAN ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED
